News.headline: Twitter Competition: Signed Peter Richardson Book "Rejected"
News.page_title: Twitter Competition: Signed Peter Richardson Book "Rejected"
News.URL_keywords: Twitter Competition: Signed Peter Richardson Book "Rejected"
News.short_description: Dont Forget we are giving away a signed copy of Peter Richardson's book "Rejected" which has been signed by the author on our twitter page
News.description:
Head over to our twitter to be up for a chance of winning a copy of the Peter Richardson book "Rejected" signed by the author.

Winner will be picked Tuesday at 1:00pm, so head over to our twitter page now to enter, all you have to do is re-tweet our Peter Richardson signed book competition tweet.

Our twitter competition tweet is linked below, don't miss out on the chance to get the book signed by Peter Richardson.

Click here to head over to the tweet.

To find out more information on the book click here.
